title: Analyzing the impact of the size of fluoro and chloro substituents on induced mesomorphism in hydrogen bonded liquid crystals
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20398-20409
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08569D, Paper
Open Access

M. K. Sonali, Rajeev K. Sinha, Silpa Elizabeth Peter, N. V. Anil Kumar, Nirmal Mazumder, Sindhoora Kaniyala Melanthota, Mohammed Azeezulla Nazrulla, Poornima Bhagavath
This study explores the effects of both size and position of halo substituents on the mesomorphic behaviour of hydrogen-bonded liquid crystals.
